items.question: What is Scriptura?
items.answer: Scriptura is an online platform designed to help individuals and groups study the Bible more effectively.

items.question: Is Scriptura suitable for beginners?
items.answer: Scriptura caters to all levels of biblical knowledge, from beginners to advanced students.

items.question: Can I use Scriptura with my church or small group?
items.answer: Yes, Scriptura is great for group study.

items.question: What translations of the Bible are available on Scriptura?
items.answer: Scriptura provides access to multiple translations.

items.question: How often is new content added to Scriptura?
items.answer: We regularly update our content library with new courses.
